ygData.subject: RE: Bard Quests
ygData.msgSnippet: ... =(   yeah, even I still fail and pull a whole bunch of goobers when I lament.  It s rare that it happens, but everything agros when it does.  But I d say
ygData.messageBody:
>What are the chances of a bard less than 30th level
>successfully Lamenting a 30+ mob? I would guess not
>very high.

=( yeah, even I still fail and pull a whole bunch
of goobers when I lament. It's rare that it happens,
but everything agros when it does. But I'd say as long
as you are within 5 levels or so of the monster, and have
maybe good charisma? you could pull it off. Not too sure,
never really test lament out a whole lot, until I got older.

Harmonic Distortion, 40th unchained melody.
League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
